pr_title: MULE-19055: SampleDataProvider validator is not validating generic

timeline.message: MULE-19055: SampleDataProvider validator is not validating generic

timeline.bodyText: Maybe when the type is null, and is the generic of the SampleDataProvider, we should add an error that states that the SampleDataProviderGenerics must be explicit.
timeline.author: ndinu

replies.bodyText: This is for cases in which one of the provider's generic types is a Map or some other parameterized type where we cannot take it upon ourselves to demand proper use of those clases
replies.author: marianogonzalez
